OTPSubject.LoginUntrustedDevice: Verification Code for Login from New Device

register.headline: Verify Your Email Address
register.content: Thank you for starting the process of creating a new account on Shopsifu. We want to ensure it’s really you. Please enter the verification code below when prompted. If you do not wish to create an account, you can ignore this message.

resetPassword.headline: Reset Your Password
resetPassword.content: We received a request to reset the password for your account. Please use the verification code below to complete the password reset process. If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this email.

login.headline: Login Verification
login.content: Please use the verification code below to complete the login process for your Shopsifu account.

login_2fa.headline: Two-Factor Authentication
login_2fa.content: Please use the verification code below to complete the two-factor authentication process for your Shopsifu account.

disable_2fa.headline: Disable Two-Factor Authentication
disable_2fa.content: You are requesting to disable two-factor authentication for your Shopsifu account. Please use the code below to confirm this change.

setup_2fa.headline: Set Up Two-Factor Authentication
setup_2fa.content: You are setting up two-factor authentication for your Shopsifu account. Please use the code below to confirm.

login_untrusted_device_otp.headline: Login from New Device
login_untrusted_device_otp.content: We detected a new login request from an unrecognized device. Please use the verification code below to confirm it’s you. If you did not attempt to log in, please change your password immediately.

reverify_session_otp.headline: Reverify Your Session
reverify_session_otp.content: To secure your account, we require re-verification of your current session. Please use the verification code below.

verify_new_email.headline: Verify New Email Address
verify_new_email.content: You have requested to change the email address for your Shopsifu account. Please use the verification code below to confirm this new email address.

Email.disclaimer: Shopsifu will never send an email asking you to disclose or verify your password, credit card number, or bank account details.
